that think they are such geniuses that they can out guess spirit and every
other frikkin' thing in the world.

 The skeptics can't make the box go away, so what do they do? Name calling

and noise that the entities manipulate into voices and messages. There are

recording, who is recording and what you want to hear/know. You do not have

that shit is over and useless. Forget you ever saw Ghost Busters, and every
other Hollywood paranormal movie. If you think you know all about
spirit-you're wrong!
